name: @appnest/readme
description: Automatically generate a beautiful best-practice README file based on the contents of your repository
author: Appnest

scripts.b:lib:prebuild: npm run prebuild && npm run b:lib
scripts.readme: npm run b:lib && npm run generate:readme
scripts.git:add:commit:push: git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend --no-verify && git push
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run git:add:commit:push
scripts.publish:patch: npm run bump:patch && npm run b:lib:prebuild && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run bump:minor && npm run b:lib:prebuild && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run bump:major && npm run b:lib:prebuild && npm run publish
scripts.push:readme: npm run readme && git add . && git commit -m 'New readme' && git push
